English.Name: [M:I1]Snatch Orb
English.LongDescription:
An item that gives [LS:13680]Snatch[LE] status to the
user. This status lets the user steal the
effects of all moves used by Pokémon
on the floor. 


Select detail:[CLUM_SET:70][M:B4] or [M:B5]/View detail: [M:B2][BAR]
Range:[CLUM_SET:36] User
